abstract: Muzak, the company behind elevator music, on Tuesday won a bankruptcy judge’s approval of its reorganization plan, clearing the way for an exit from Chapter 11 protection.
snippet: Muzak, the company behind elevator music, on Tuesday won a bankruptcy judge’s approval of its reorganization plan, clearing the way for an exit from Chapter 11 protection.
lead_paragraph: The music may not have stopped when Muzak filed for bankruptcy last year, but the company synonymous with the songs piped into elevators and retail stores is playing a happier tune on Tuesday.

headline.main: Muzak Wins Approval to Exit Chapter 11
